<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> ofp

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.00

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Math

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Let '''x''' be a number, then '''exp (x)''' is equal to '''e to the power of x''' (or e^x)

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> [[Number]] <ext><name>nowiki</name><attr/><inner>=</inner><close></nowiki></close></ext> '''exp''' x

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value>  x: [[Number]]

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Number]]
		  
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>_result = [[exp]] 1</code>

returns 2.7182

</value></part><part><name index="6"/><value> [[Math Commands]] [http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/E_(mathematical_constant) E (mathematical constant)]
</value></part></template>

<dl class="command_description">
<comment><!-- Note Section BEGIN -->
</comment><dt class="note">Unknown <dd class="note">Note that you cannot exponent a value greater than 88.72283554077147726999 (999 repeating), as this is beyond what the game can calculate.

<comment><!-- Note Section END -->
</comment></dl>
